description: A fiery, smoky and peppery way to enjoy the succulent texture of lamb.
keywords: Roast lamb,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Slow Roast Shoulder Of Lamb with Harissa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 150Â°C. Evenly spread the canola oil over the shoulder of lamb and cover fully. Attached the rosemary to the meat also using a oven safe string.
Place the shoulder of lamb into the oven in a baking dish for 180 minutes. Remove from the oven and take 4 tablespoons of the oil from the bottom of the dish and mix in with the harissa paste.
Spread the harissa paste evenly over the shoulder and place back into the oven to bake for a further 30 minutes before serving with a choice of condiments.
